extension.name: Webportal Menu
extension.author: Jonathan Ablanida
extension.copyright: Copyright Â© 2014 Softverk Ltd, All rights reserved.
extension.description: Provides a responsive menu that is able to toggle on/off mobile menus. Cannot co-exist with the traditional mod_menu as of yet.

field.name: menutype
field.label: Select Menu
field.description: Select a menu in the list

field.name: base
field.label: Base Item
field.description: Base Item - Select a menu item to always be used as the base for the menu display. You must set the Start Level to the same level or higher than the level of the base item. This will cause the module to be displayed on all assigned pages. If Current is selected the currently active item is used as the base. This causes the module to only display when the parent menu item is active.

field.name: startLevel
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Start Level - Level to start rendering the menu at. Setting the start and end levels to the same # and setting 'Show Sub-menu Items' to yes will only display that single level.

field.name: endLevel
field.label: End Level
field.description: End Level - Level to stop rendering the menu at. If you choose 'All', all levels will be shown depending on 'Show Sub-menu Items' setting.

field.name: showAllChildren
field.label: Show Sub-menu Items
field.description: Show Sub-menu Items - Expand the menu and make its sub-menu items always visible.

field.name: tag_id
field.label: Menu Tag ID
field.description: Menu Tag ID - An ID attribute to assign to the root UL tag of the menu (optional)

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: Menu Class Suffix - A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the menu items

field.name: window_open
field.label: Target Position
field.description: Target Position - JavaScript values to position a popup window, e.g. top=50,left=50,width=200,height=300
